concept.definition: List choices along the horizontal axis
List choices down the vertical axis

description: Direction in which lists of question options should be displayed
name: ChoiceListOrientation

text.div:
ChoiceListOrientation

Direction in which lists of question options should be displayed

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/choice-list-orientation defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
horizontal HorizontalList choices along the horizontal axis
vertical VerticalList choices down the vertical axis
